security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation and code pattern examples. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or filesystem access. Pure documentation skill providing architectural guidance for API client implementation.

content.user_title: Build API clients with TanStack Query and Axios
content.value_statement: Building API clients requires secure patterns for authentication, error handling, and type-safe responses. This skill provides expert implementation guidance using industry-standard libraries like TanStack Query, Axios, and Zod.
actual_capabilities: Configure TanStack Query with caching and retry strategies
Create Axios instances with JWT token interceptors
Implement global error handling with status-specific responses
Build type-safe API hooks with Zod schema validation
Handle pagination with infinite queries and optimistic updates
limitations: Does not execute network requests directly
Requires integration with existing auth store pattern
Does not provide backend API implementations

best_practices: Configure appropriate staleTime and gcTime to balance freshness and performance
Use AbortController for cancelable requests to prevent race conditions
Implement optimistic updates with rollback on error for better UX
anti_patterns: Avoid hardcoding API URLs; use environment variables instead
Do not skip error handling for 4xx status codes
Avoid blocking UI with synchronous API calls; use async patterns

faq.question: Which React frameworks are supported?
faq.answer: Supports Next.js, Vite, and Create React App with React 18+ using TanStack Query v5.

faq.question: What are the rate limits?
faq.answer: No limits enforced. Configure retryDelay and timeout in queryClient for resilience.

faq.question: Can I use this with other auth providers?
faq.answer: Yes. Replace useAuthStore with any auth provider that exposes session token.

faq.question: Is my API data sent anywhere?
faq.answer: No. This skill only generates patterns; data stays in your application.

faq.question: Why are my queries not refreshing?
faq.answer: Check staleTime settings and ensure queryKey consistency across components.

faq.question: How does this compare to plain fetch?
faq.answer: TanStack Query provides caching, retry, and loading states automatically.
